message: Hello Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you, even more so than it is to me.  To be fair, I'm initially offering it to you at $1,400,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value I can get out of the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the value, but my initial offer was already taking that into consideration.  Let's meet in the middle - $1,300,000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit higher on the value I can get from this product. How about $1,250,000?

Bob, it seems like we're both serious about this deal and close to an agreement.  I'm willing to come down slightly further to $1,275,000.  I believe this reflects the true value of the product for both of us.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on the budget. I'm willing to go up to $1,280,000, but that's as high as I can go. Can we meet at this price?
